eya 114 wani sthawara niyogayen kiyawenawa. 114(1)n kiyawenne yam yam karunu sandaha sama sasi warayak aarambhaye di ma therim karaka sabhawa lesa handinwena karaka sabhawak thibiya yuthu bawa ya. 114(2)n kiyawenne ee therim karaka sabhawa parlimenthuwa wisin sama sabha warayaka ma aarambhaye di nam kala yuthu manthriwarun dolosdenakugen samanwiya yuthu bawa ya.
